item.name: Albert River Wines
item.description: Albert River is one of the high-profile wineries in the Gold Coast hinterland. David and Janette Bladin, with a combined 30 years experience in tourism and hospitality, acquired and relocated two of Qlds most historic buildings, Tamborine House and Auchenflower House. In December 2008 Samdoo Corporation, a private Korean developer, acquired the property. It has redeveloped the vineyards, expanded Tamborine House for weddings and events in a large area overlooking the vineyard Exports to Japan.
